name: Abandoned Psychiatric Hospital
description: A sprawling complex with decaying wards and medical equipment left behind. Known for its eerie atmosphere.

name: Beelitz-Heilst√§tten Sanatorium
description: A historic German hospital complex famous for its grand, decaying architecture and featured in several films.

name: Forgotten Industrial Silos
description: A series of towering concrete silos that once served a now-defunct factory. Great for vertical exploration and photography.

name: Pripyat Amusement Park
description: The iconic, never-opened amusement park in the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone, featuring a decaying Ferris wheel and bumper cars.

name: Flooded Metro Station
description: An entire metro station submerged in water after a construction failure. Currently unsafe for entry.

name: Hashima Island (Gunkanjima)
description: A former undersea coal mining facility off the coast of Japan. Access is heavily restricted due to unsafe structures.
